January 24, 2025 - Kyoto Dew is the best matcha I ever tried, so I was pleased to see it at the top of your list. If you go to their website and sign up for emails, they send out discount coupons quite frequently. It’s still expensive! But when you buy in bulk with the coupon it is so much cheaper than even on Amazon. But I appreciate the Amazon links for all the matchas tested. ... Thank you for the tip, Ellen! ... s: October 24, 2023 - I tried Naoki Fine Uji Matcha, which is from the Uji region in Kyoto, Japan, well-known for its matcha. While Uji matcha often attracts attention due to the brand name, it's essential to recognize that there are high-quality matchas from other Japanese regions like Kagoshima.
